icd10_codes.description: Rheumatoid arthritis with involvement of multiple sites
icd10_codes.evidence: bilateral synovitis of MCPs, PIPs, and wrists with ulnar deviation. Both knees are warm and swollen

icd10_codes.description: Rheumatoid arthritis with rheumatoid factor of multiple sites with involvement of other organs and systems
icd10_codes.evidence: RF positive (75 IU/mL), anti-CCP positive (>200 U/mL)
X-rays of hands show periarticular osteopenia and early erosive changes

icd10_codes.description: Dry eye syndrome of right lacrimal gland
icd10_codes.evidence: Patient also reports occasional dry eyes
reports occasional dry eyes and mouth
